CV

General Information

Full Name Jessé Paixão
Date of Birth 1th June 1994
Languages English, Portuguese, French

Education

  • 2023 (prevision)
    PhD in Structural Dynamics
    University Bourgogne Franche-Comté / FEMTO-ST Institute, France
    • Self-design manufacturing of high-performance engineering structures
    • Supervised by Prof. Scott Cogan and Prof. Emmanuel Foltête
  • 2020
    MSc in Solid Mechanics
    São Paulo State University (UNESP), Brazil
    • Damage quantification in laminated composites using gaussian process regression model
    • Supervised by Prof. Samuel da Silva.
  • 2018
    Bachelor in Mechanical Engineering
    São Paulo State University (UNESP), Brazil

Experience

  • 08/2019 - 11/2019
    Research Internship Abroad
    Chonnam National University, Gwangju, South Korea
  • 07/2019 - 08/2019
    Visting Student
    Lusophone University of Humanities and Technology, Lisbon, Portugal
  • 01/2018 - 03/2018
    Assistant R&D Engineer
    CorWave, Paris, France
  • 06/2017 - 12/2017
    R&D Internship
    CorWave, Paris, France

Open Source Projects

  • 2022
    EASER
    • EASER contains the source code for the application of the proposed self-design manufacturing paradigm in a demonstration case of fabrication of a beam-like vibration absorber.
  • 2020
    CONCEPT
    • CONCEPT is a dataset of lamb-wave measured in composite structures in healthy and damaged states.

Honors and Awards

  • 2018
    • CREA Outstanding Undergraduate Student Award
    • UNESP Outstanding Undergraduate Student Award
